!Newbie Guide: Welcome! You are an Orc who has pledged loyalty to Flame Lord Kakai! I am a warrior of Atuba, the tribe of wolves. I'm in charge of educating novices like you. Whenever I feel you're ready, I'll teach you what you need to learn! If you want to become a powerful Orc hero on the Immortal Plateau, you'll have to pay attention to my advice.
